snippet.title: Detached – first 4 minutes of single player gameplay footage (Oculus Rift)
snippet.description:
Buy the Early Access version of the game from Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/436230/

Being left behind in a detached cargo from an enormous Class B Trawler – Big Zoe, you must make your way through an abandoned space station, before you run out of resources. Equipped only with an advanced EVA space suit, your skill in zero G flight will be tested, both in single and multiplayer. The space may be vast, but you are not alone in it. The cargo did not detach on its own…

Detached is a First Person PvP Experience, focused on rivalry, exploration and survival, that was designed for VR headsets specifically. Featuring a single player and multiplayer mode, allowing you to test your astronaut flying skills. It’s a unique, intense, VR title, that's unlike anything you've seen in the genre. A game that will give you a total movement, rotations and accelerations freedom. One that even encourages you to try intense maneuvers in space, so you could feel like a real astronaut.

Detached will allow you to achieve the full immersion while exploring a sandbox environment, solving puzzles and competing against your rival. You will experience the outer space like you never did before.

Featuring dynamic and challenging PvP gameplay built around a non-violent puzzle solving and capture-the-flag-style exploration, Detached provides a multiplayer experience with a huge replay value.

For more information about the game visit:

Official website: http://detachedgame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DetachedGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DetachedGame
